prompt:
A seductive Korean woman in her 20s by a fitting room curtain, framed waist-up to mid-thigh.
Pose: one hand gripping the curtain edge, hips angled, torso subtly arched; slight turn back.
Expression: unwavering eye contact, narrowed eyes, parted lips, no smile.
Outfit: fitted cotton jersey top + high-waist skirt, matte texture.
Lighting: warm fitting-room light + cooler corridor spill mixed, smooth highlight roll-off.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid. Film: Portra 400.
